metadata.title: Sorrick 2020 Fantasy Football Championship Ring in Clear Display Case | Heavy Duty Silver Tone FFL League Champ with Stand (Size 12)
features: FANTASY FOOTBALL CHAMPIONSHIP RING: Great affordable yearly prize for the playoff champion of the league.
LARGE HEAVY DUTY RING: Weighs over 2 ounces to give it a realistic championship ring look to wear at your fantasy draft. Bling out your hand with the shiny silver tone ring.
CLASSIC TROPHY DESIGN: Trophy in the main face of the ring with a large crystal for the football.
OVER 50 CRYSTAL RHINESTONES: With so many crystal rhinestones the ring draws the eye to it.
CLEAR ACRYLIC DISPLAY CASE: Great for office league to display on your desk to remind everyone that you are the best. Has a stand inside to proudly display the ring.
description: 2020 Fantasy football championship ring with display case. Great for presentation at the 2021 fantasy draft to the previous year champ. Silver plated with crystal rhinestones give the appearance and a luxury diamond ring at a budget to meet any entry fee fantasy league. Get a new ring every year and easily see who has the most championships by one handshake.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "2.44 x 2.44 x 2.4 inches; 4.16 Ounces", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "March 9, 2021"}
